ReplicaSetName.description: Human-readable label that identifies the replica set on the sharded cluster.

ExportedCollections.description: Number of collections on the replica set that MongoDB Cloud exported.

TotalCollections.description: Total number of collections on the replica set to export.

Key.description: Key for the metadata file that MongoDB Cloud uploads to the bucket when the export job finishes.

Value.description: Value for the key to include in file that MongoDB Cloud uploads to the bucket when the export job finishes.

Href.description: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) that points another API resource to which this response has some relationship. This URL often begins with `https://mms.mongodb.com`.

Rel.description: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) that defines the semantic relationship between this resource and another API resource. This URL often begins with `https://mms.mongodb.com`.

description: Returns, adds, and removes Cloud Backup snapshot export buckets. Also returns and adds Cloud Backup export jobs.

ClusterName.description: Human-readable label that identifies the cluster.

Components.description: Information on the export job for each replica set in the sharded cluster.

CreatedAt.description: Date and time when someone created this export job. MongoDB Cloud represents this timestamp in ISO 8601 format in UTC.

CustomDataSet.description: Collection of key-value pairs that represent custom data for the metadata file that MongoDB Cloud uploads to the bucket when the export job finishes.

DeliveryUrl.description: One or more Uniform Resource Locators (URLs) that point to the compressed snapshot files for manual download. MongoDB Cloud returns this parameter when `"deliveryType" : "download"`.

ExportBucketId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies the AWS bucket to which MongoDB Cloud exports the Cloud Backup snapshot.

ExportId.description: Unique string that identifies the AWS S3 bucket to which you export your snapshots.

ExportStatus.description: State of the export job for the collections on the replica set only.

FinishedAt.description: Date and time when this export job completed. MongoDB Cloud represents this timestamp in ISO 8601 format in UTC.

GroupId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies the restore job.

IncludeCount.description: Flag that indicates whether the response returns the total number of items (**totalCount**) in the response.

ItemsPerPage.description: Number of items that the response returns per page.

Links.description: List of one or more Uniform Resource Locators (URLs) that point to API sub-resources, related API resources, or both. RFC 5988 outlines these relationships.

PageNum.description: Number of the page that displays the current set of the total objects that the response returns.

Prefix.description: Full path on the cloud provider bucket to the folder where the snapshot is exported.

SnapshotId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies the snapshot.
